name: Soko Match
description: In a geometric world where the "Realm" controls their lives, Cal seeks to find his wife after her suspicious disappearance. A sokoban-like puzzle game in a colorful challenging environment with diverse game-play.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000 Storage: 80 MB available space
